links.to_node: The police may take my silence as agreement with my girlfriend's account of the incident.
I may face legal consequences if the police believe my girlfriend's version of events.
My girlfriend may feel supported and validated by my decision to stay silent.
The relationship dynamics between me and my girlfriend may be affected by my decision to not speak up in the situation.
The other guy may feel emboldened if he believes he can get away with making derogatory remarks without consequences.
